thread.title: Signs of a memory chip slowdown spook investors

title: Signs of a memory chip slowdown spook investors
text:
Signs of a memory chip slowdown spook investors 12:00pm GMT - 01:50 
After a blistering year-and-a-half long surge, a sudden drop in some memory prices, followed by Samsung Electronics Co’s disappointing profit estimate, is causing jitters among investors who had bet the chip boom would last at least another year.   
After a blistering year-and-a-half long surge, a sudden drop in some memory prices, followed by Samsung Electronics Co’s disappointing profit estimate, is causing jitters among investors who had bet the chip boom would last at least another year.  //reut.rs/2B2pLpZ
